Replace.Text: Emperor Keke <Scarlet Nightmare>
<Scarlet Nightmare> Tokisaki Kurumi
Emperor Keke's "Scarlet Nightmare"
Emperor Keke: One Bullet
Tokisaki Kurumi's special project requires [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time. Military units currently located in the territory of this city have +1 [ICON_Movement] movement.
+1[ICON_Movement] movement.
Emperor Keke: The Second Bullet
Tokisaki Kurumi's special project requires [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time, and the enemy military units currently located in the territory of this city have -1 [ICON_Movement] movement power.
Emperor Keke: The Bullet of Three
Tokisaki Kurumi's special project requires [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time. Military units currently located in the territory of this city will gain additional combat experience points.
Experience gained from combat +33%.
Emperor Keke: The Fourth Bullet
Tokisaki Kurumi's special project requires [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time. Military units currently located in the territory of this city can be healed every round.
This unit heals every turn.
Emperor Keke: Five Balls
Tokisaki Kurumi's special project requires [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time, and the military units currently located within the territory of this city have +1 vision.
Vision +1.
Emperor Keke: Six Bullets
Tokisaki Kurumi's special project requires [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time, and the enemy military units currently located in the territory of this city have -1 vision.
Vision -1.
Emperor Keke: The Bullet of Seven
Tokisaki Kurumi's special item requires [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time], and other players' current military units' [ICON_Movement] mobility will be greatly reduced for three rounds.
[ICON_Movement]Movement has been significantly reduced.
Emperor Keke: Eight Balls
Tokisaki Kurumi's special project requires [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time to obtain a Nightmare Shadow without consuming [ICON_Citizen] population.
Emperor Keke: Nine Bullets
Tokisaki Kurumi's special project requires [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time to gain temporary vision of all cities and city-states.
Emperor Keke: Ten Bullets

Tokisaki Kurumi's special project requires [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time to increase the visibility level of the object with the lowest diplomatic visibility [ICON_VisLimited] by one level. [COLOR_Civ6Red] If diplomatic visibility reaches maximum for all civilizations, [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] consumed will be refunded[ENDCOLOR].
Emperor Keke: The Bullet of Eleven

Tokisaki Kurumi's special project requires [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time. Your empire gains [ICON_Science] scientific value, [ICON_Culture] cultural value, [ICON_Gold] gold coins and [ICON_Faith] faith that are proportional to the city's productivity.
Emperor Keke: Twelve Bullets

Tokisaki Kurumi's special project requires [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time]. Other empires lose the [ICON_Science] science value, [ICON_Culture] culture value, [ICON_Gold] gold coin and [ICON_Faith] faith produced in three rounds.
+{1_num} points of [ICON_Production] productivity.
+{1_num} points [ICON_Gold] gold coins.
Shadow power
Gain additional [ICON_Strength] combat power from Nightmare Camp and adjacent Nightmare Shadows.
+{Amount} from Nightmare Camp
+{Amount} from adjacent Nightmare Shadow
One bullet
+1[ICON_Movement] movement. Ignores the [ICON_Movement] movement cost of terrain and landforms.
Two bullets
Adjacent enemy units have -1[ICON_Movement] movement. This unit can only be discovered by adjacent enemy units.
space shock
100% efficiency when attacking cities and camps from a distance. When a unit is killed in combat, all adjacent enemy combat units lose [ICON_Damaged] health.
eclipse of time

When a unit is destroyed, additional [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time is gained. When attacking a city, there is a certain chance that it will lose its population and gain [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time].
double the pain
When attacking a wounded unit, +5[ICON_Strength] combat strength. When a unit is destroyed, it can heal up to 30 health points.
The realm of circulation
Block the first non-lethal damage taken each round.
dance of time
If [ICON_Movement] mobility allows, +1 additional attack per round. When you kill a unit in combat, there is a chance to restore [ICON_Movement] movement and attack times.
City of Eclipse

Tokisaki Kurumi's special project consumes one [ICON_Citizen] population in exchange for [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time, and the city's [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty is slightly reduced. [NEWLINE][COLOR_RED]If there is only one [ICON_Citizen] left in the city, it will become a free city. [ENDCOLOR]
Get {1_iAmount} points [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time
Nightmare Workshop

Halloween Madness III's special building replaces the workshop. [NEWLINE]After researching "Electricity" technology, this building can provide an additional +2 [ICON_Culture] cultural value for the city where it is located. [NEWLINE] Its [ICON_Production] productivity bonus extends to all city centers within 3 tiles that do not receive bonuses from this building type. [NEWLINE]If there is a chief executive in this city, you will get a [ICON_RESOURCE_DAL_POTION] potion, a specially produced luxury resource that can +6 [ICON_Amenities] satisfaction. [NEWLINE]This city gets the [ICON_Production] productivity bonus from all nearby industrial buildings with area bonuses, not just the first one.
-1[ICON_Movement] movement (Wall of Nightmares).
Nightmare Dungeon

The unique improved facilities of Warrior Crazy Three are +1 [ICON_Culture] cultural value. After developing drama and poetry, an additional +1 [ICON_Culture] cultural value will be added. Provides [ICON_tourism] tourism performance after R&D flight. -2[ICON_Appeal] Charm. Each city can only have one dungeon, which cannot be built next to another dungeon. It can be built on plains or hilly cells without landforms. [NEWLINE]Occupied units gain +4 [ICON_Strength] defense. Adjacent non-friendly units have -1 [ICON_Movement] movement power. When stepping into them, there is a high chance of receiving damage and a low chance of gaining experience points.
Failed to challenge the dungeon!
I am an elf.
Come on, come on, let's get started. (Invite you to visit)
You are a prey a thousand times more delicious than cake. (accept your invitation)
Come on, come on, let's get started. (Swap the location of the capital)
Time is extremely considerate, and time is extremely cruel.
If it’s you, it’s okay (I issued a declaration of friendship.)
I'm terrible, right? (Declaration of friendship rejected.)
Now, behind that arrogant smile, I feel lonely too. (Tokisaki Kurumi seeks a declaration of friendship with you.)

The Weaver Girl and the Cowherd will never forget each other no matter how many years it rains. Now... no matter how many years of rain it rains, will you never forget me? (Published a declaration of friendship with Kurumi Tokisaki.)
...Oh oh oh (rejected the declaration of friendship with Tokisaki Kurumi.)
Then, I will kill you virtuously as you wish. (Open declaration of war against Kurumi Tokisaki.)
Hee hee hee hee, if this happens, they will definitely die together. (Public declaration of war by Kurumi Tokisaki.)
It's time to call it a day. (Tokisaki Kurumi was defeated.)
Let's end it here. (Tokisaki Kurumi was defeated.)
They all look delicious, I’m really looking forward to it~ (Has been visited by the special envoy.)
……Oh My God. (The special envoy’s visit has been refused.)
Ah la ah la, I'm so interested in what you are doing, don't pose like this, let me join in too. (Tokisaki Kurumi requested the special envoy to visit.)
Ah, I can't help myself. (Accepted for special envoy visit.)
Pull, pull. (The special envoy’s visit was denied.)
Time cannot turn the chains of life and destiny! (Made a statement of blame against Kurumi Tokisaki.)
Don't you think this mentality is strange when you clearly want to kill a certain creature but are not prepared to be killed? (A statement of blame was issued by Kurumi Tokisaki.)
——Then, let me truly repay the debt I owe you this time. (Establishment of embassy is accepted.)
I am really a willful child. (The establishment of the embassy was rejected.)
Ah la ah la, I'm so interested in what you are doing, don't pose like this, let me join in too. (Tokisaki Kurumi wanted to establish an embassy.)
──Welcome, I've been waiting for you for a long time. (Embassies are allowed.)
How sad. (Refuse to establish an embassy.)
The changes in people's hearts are something that even I can't predict.
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki’s agenda of “valuing cultural values” (the cultural value is very high)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda of "focusing on happiness" (very high satisfaction)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki’s agenda of “liking gold coins” (earning a lot of gold coins)
Fitting Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "heavy industrialist" (production values ​​are high)
In line with Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "city-state alliance" (does not conflict with city-state suzerainty)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda of "Numerism" (a large population)
In line with Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Technology Follower" (high technology value)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Standing Army" (high military power)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Survival of the Fittest" (active in the war)
Fits Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Spokesperson for great men" (there are very few great men)
Fits Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Those who cherish heritage" (few spectacles)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "City-State Protector" (actively protecting the city-state)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "City-State Protector" (actively protecting the city-state)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "air power" (air power is very high)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "City-State Protector" (actively protecting the city-state)
In line with Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Civilized Country" (repelling the barbarian camp)
Fits Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda as an "environmentalist" (dedicated to nature preservation and national park development)
"Developmentist" who fits Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda (keen on logging and terrain improvement)
Fits Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Idealistic Physique" (same as the government)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda of "nuclear happiness" (active use of nuclear weapons)
In line with Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "piety" (faith value is high)
An "explorer" that fits Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda (map completion is very low)
Fitting Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "paranoia" (lack of military power and drive to expand territory)
——You can’t even go down to the lower realm.
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda of "valuing cultural values" (Cultural values ​​are very low)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda of "focusing on happiness" (satisfaction is very low)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Likes gold coins" (earns little from gold coins)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "City-State Alliance" (conflicts with city-state suzerainty)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Heavy industrialist" (production values ​​are very low)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda of "Numerism" (population is small)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Technology Follower" (Technology value is very low)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Standing Army" (military power is very low)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Paranoia" (full of military power and drive to expand territory)
Going against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "The spokesperson of great men" (there are many great men)
Going against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Those who cherish heritage" (many wonders)
Going against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "City-State Protector" (did not protect the city-state)
Going against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "City-State Protector" (did not protect the city-state)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda of "air power" (air power is very low)
Going against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "City-State Protector" (did not protect the city-state)
Going against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda of "civilized country" (leaving the barbarian camp alone)
Going against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "environmentalist" (destroying nature)
Go against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Developmentist" (passionate about nature preservation)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Idealistic Physique" (different government)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda of "nuclear happiness" (unwillingness to use nuclear weapons)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda of "piety" (faith value is very low)
"Explorer" that goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda (map is very complete)
Let me have a good taste of you~ (Agreed to form an alliance.)
Gee, don’t you believe me? It's so sad, I want to cry. (Rejected to form alliance.)
Come and fall in love with me~ (Alliance negotiations begin)
Let me have a good taste of you~ (Agree to form an alliance.)
To me everyone is both sad and adorable food. (Refuse to enter into alliance.)
Ahahahaha~ (Agree to the deal.)
Come on...please add more oil. (Transaction declined.)
Very gentle, huh? (The transaction has been established.)
Right now I have a proposal, let's change the rules. It's not a difficult thing, it's just a change of goals~ (The deal was rejected.)
Time is extremely considerate, and time is extremely cruel. (Tokisaki Kurumi is satisfied with the terms and conditions.)
Hahaha, it’s so dangerous. (Tokisaki Kurumi declined the request.)
Except for my spiritual life, I dedicate everything to you. (Tokisaki Kurumi accepted the request.)
Hahaha, I have to ask you to really take responsibility. (Accepted Tokisaki Kurumi’s request.)
You either give me an eyeball, or you let me drink your blood, or you touch my head to comfort me, or I will continue to cry. (Rejected Kurumi Tokisaki’s request.)
It’s almost time to add ‘time’... (Conclude peace negotiations with Tokisaki Kurumi.)
Hee hee hee...Don't you──don't you understand? ? You are absolutely impossible to completely eliminate me! ! (Peace negotiations were rejected by Kurumi Tokisaki.)
How should I put it? Should I say it is an ever-lasting fate, or an inseparable feeling... (Tokisaki Kurumi proposes peaceful negotiations.)
It’s almost time to add ‘time’... (Conclude peace negotiations with Tokisaki Kurumi.)
Hee hee hee...Don't you──don't you understand? ? You are absolutely impossible to completely eliminate me! ! (Rejected Kurumi Tokisaki’s peace negotiation.)
Come on, come on, please come in. (Tokisaki Kurumi gave permission for the border to be opened.)
Hahaha, it’s so dangerous. (Tokisaki Kurumi refuses to open the border.)
Ah la ah la, I'm so interested in what you are doing, don't pose like this, let me join in too. (Kurizo Tokisaki demands that the borders be opened.)
Ahh...ahhh, I can't wait, I can't wait. (Tokisaki Kurumi was allowed to open the border.)
I'm terrible, right? (Tokisaki Kurumi was refused permission to open the border.)
Today the terrible and terrible fire spirit is here again. I will say goodbye here. (Tokisaki Kurumi promises you to stop settling near the border.)
You are all just bait in the eyes of me, who is pitiful and lovely. (Tokisaki Kurumi ignored the warning and continued to settle near the border.)
Today the terrible and terrible fire spirit is here again. I will say goodbye here. (Tokisaki Kurumi promises you not to take military action.)
You are all just bait in the eyes of me, who is pitiful and lovely. (Tokisaki Kurumi ignored the warning and sought an opportunity for military action.)
Today the terrible and terrible fire spirit is here again. I will say goodbye here. (Tokisaki Kurumi promised you not to send spies.)
You are all just bait in the eyes of me, who is pitiful and lovely. (Tokisaki Kurumi ignored the warning and continued his espionage activities.)
Today the terrible and terrible fire spirit is here again. I will say goodbye here. (Tokisaki Kurumi promises you not to steal secret treasures.)
You are all just bait in the eyes of me, who is pitiful and lovely. (Tokisaki Kurumi ignored the warning and continued to steal the treasure.)
Today the terrible and terrible fire spirit is here again. I will say goodbye here. (Tokisaki Kurumi promises you to stop missionary work.)
You are all just bait in the eyes of me, who is pitiful and lovely. (Tokisaki Kurumi ignored the warning and continued his missionary activities.)
Kurumi Tokisaki asks you: Stop colonizing near the border
Ah, come play with me first. (Agree to Tokisaki Kurumi’s request.)
No one can escape the prison of time. (Rejecting Kurumi Tokisaki’s request.)
Kurumi Tokisaki has a request for you: Do not send troops near the border
Ah, come play with me first. (Agree to Tokisaki Kurumi’s request.)
No one can escape the prison of time. (Rejecting Kurumi Tokisaki’s request.)
Kurumi Tokisaki asks you: Stop sending spies
Ah, come play with me first. (Agree to Tokisaki Kurumi’s request.)
No one can escape the prison of time. (Rejecting Kurumi Tokisaki’s request.)
Kurumi Tokisaki’s request to you: Don’t steal and dig up secret treasures
Ah, come play with me first. (Agree to Tokisaki Kurumi’s request.)
No one can escape the prison of time. (Rejecting Kurumi Tokisaki’s request.)
Kurumi Tokisaki’s request to you: Stop your missionary activities
Ah, come play with me first. (Agree to Tokisaki Kurumi’s request.)
No one can escape the prison of time. (Rejecting Kurumi Tokisaki’s request.)

If...just if, year after year, year after year...the rain on July 7th keeps falling, and the Milky Way that separates the two of them continues to be choppy...then will the two of them still miss each other? ? (Tokisaki Kurumi wants to continue the alliance.)
Ahh...ahhh, I can't wait, I can't wait. (Permission for Kurumi Tokisaki's alliance to continue.)
Hope we can meet again one day. (Reject Kurumi Tokisaki’s alliance continuation.)
I am here to become one with you~ (The continuation of the alliance has been approved.)
I am really a willful child. (Continuation of the alliance has been rejected.)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda of "gossip" (actively declare friendship, open borders, send envoys, establish embassies)
Gossip that goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda (passive declaration of friendship, opening borders, sending envoys, establishing embassy)
In line with Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Follow" (ushering in the golden age)
Go against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Follow" (Fall into the Dark Ages)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda, "The Human Family" (Falling into the Dark Ages)
Going against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "The Human Family" (ushering in the golden age)
In line with Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "territorial expansionist" (vast territory)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "territorial expansionist" (small territory)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda as a "flat Earther" (passive participation in the competition for space development)
Go against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda as a "Flat Earther" (actively participating in the competition for space development)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Great Snow White Fleet" (the navy is very powerful)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Great Snow White Fleet" (the navy is very weak)
"Instigator" who fits Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda (support for diplomacy is very low)
"Instigator" who goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda (high support for diplomacy)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki’s agenda of “building a country through sightseeing” (viewing power is very low)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda of "building a country through sightseeing" (high visual acuity)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda of "religion intolerance" (same religion)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda of "religion intolerance" (different religions)
"Liberal" who fits Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda (very few diplomatic victory points)
Go against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Liberal" (lots of diplomatic victory points)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda, "The Looter" (plundering a lot of cells)
Go against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Plunder" (plundered very few cells)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda of "Kayakuma Siege" (the capital of another civilization has not been conquered)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Kayakuma Siege" (conquered the capital of another civilization)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda, "The Zealot Party" (a religion founded by faith values)
The "enthusiastic party" (a religion founded by disbelievers) that goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda
Fits Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda as a "miser" (earns a lot of gold coins)
Goes against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Scrooge" (earns little gold coins)
Fits Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Spokesperson for great men" (there are very few great men)
Fits Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Those who cherish heritage" (few spectacles)
Going against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "The spokesperson of great men" (there are many great men)
Going against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Those who cherish heritage" (many wonders)
Fits Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Spokesperson for great men" (there are very few great men)

Going against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda "Those who cherish heritage" (many wonders)
In line with Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda of "prank" (to develop a city far away from her empire)
Going against Kurumi Tokisaki's agenda as a "prank" (developing a city near her city)
